properties.name: Name/Identifier
properties.name._toolTip: A Unique name for this UI part
properties.text._toolTip: The defined text will be displayed as the text of the UI part
properties.displayFormat._toolTip: This describes the display format of the text entered.
properties.dateFormat._toolTip: Select the format of the Date from the list.
properties.customDateFormat._toolTip: Set any user defined date format.
properties.dateDataType._toolTip: Select the data type for Date type from the list.
properties._numberFormat._toolTip: Select the format for the Number from the list. Please make sure Data type is selected with some valid value.
properties.numberDataType._toolTip: Set from the list the data type for Number.
properties.numDisplayFormat._toolTip: Enter the user defined format for the number format defined above.
properties.autocapitalizationType._toolTip: This property determines at what times the Shift key is automatically pressed, thereby making the typed character a capital letter.
properties.trim._toolTip: Blank spaces at the beginning and end of the word will be trimmed
properties.backgroundColor._toolTip: Click colour picker to select background color for UI part
properties.backgroundColor.alpha._toolTip: Select the value to make the back ground color of the UI transparent
properties.borderWeight._toolTip: The width defined will be used as the border width of the UI part
properties.borderColor._toolTip: The selected color will be used as the color of the border line
properties.borderColor.alpha._toolTip: The defined value will be used as the border transparency of the UI part
properties.hidden._toolTip: If selected, the UI part will not be visible
properties.textShadow._toolTip: If checked, then text-shadow should be visible
properties.font.textAlignment._toolTip: The Alignment of the displayed text would be as per the selected option
properties.font.fontSize._toolTip: The font size defined will be used as the size of the displayed text
properties.font.textColor._toolTip: The selected color will be used as the color of the displayed text
properties.verticalAlignment._toolTip: The vertical alignment defined will be used as the vertical alignment of the UI part
properties.padding.top._toolTip: set the padding of the top side
properties.padding.left._toolTip: set the padding of the left side
properties.padding.right._toolTip: set the padding of the right side
properties.padding.bottom._toolTip: set the padding of the right sideÂ
properties.frame.width._toolTip: The width defined will be the width used while displaying the UI part
properties.frame.height._toolTip: The height defined will be the height used while displaying the UI part

properties.actions.DidBeginEditing._toolTip: 'Editing start' will allow you to perform a corresponding action once the editing starts on the UI part
properties.actions.DidChange._toolTip: 'On Edit' will allow you to perform a corresponding action  whenever any text is entered or deleted from the UI part
properties.actions.DidEndEditing._toolTip: 'Editing End' will allow you to perform a corresponding action once the editing is done on the UI part
properties.actions.DidEndEditingError._toolTip: 'Editing End Error' will allow user to perform corresponding actions if there is an error after editing is done on the UI part

properties.frame.height._toolTip: The height defined will be the height used while displaying the UI part

properties.option._toolTip:
0: open link page on same tab, 
1: open link page on another tab, 
2: open link page on another window

[These options valid for MW only.
For other RTs, only option 2 is applicable.]
